Class DataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rafaelbattesti.data.DataAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataAccessInterface

    public class DataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataAccessInterface
    Models a database object for connection and access.

    2015.10.20

    rafaelbattesti
